description.raw:
Refactoring current code to support more system: OsX and Win.

Groovy does not support multiple-inheritance but composition with static methods can be done without any problem.

The testing was done with [ignition-transport to implement](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/):

  * Main CI jobs: trusty on default check every 5 minutes
  * Other CI jobs: vivid, win, brew, check daily
  * debbuilder for generating the ubunut packages

I still need to migrate the -any- jobs and sdks.
